bibl.title: Ein neues Zeugnis des frühen Christentums. Der Papyrus PL III/633 der Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana.
bibl.note: Preliminary presentation of a fragment of a letter of unknown provenance, of the 3rd-4th cent. A.D., in which the writer appears to give an account of a speech held by the deacon Stephan, which may echo verses from the Letter of James (2.2-6). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Ágnes Mihálykó, Ein neues Zeugnis des frühen Christentums. Der Papyrus PL III/633 der Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana.

Preliminary presentation of a fragment of a letter of unknown provenance, of the 3rd-4th cent. A.D., in which the writer appears to give an account of a speech held by the deacon Stephan, which may echo verses from the Letter of James (2.2-6). - Avec résumé en anglais.
